resources.string: To enable, go to att.com/mywireless or dial 611
There is a temporary network problem that prevents the enablement of the Mobile Hotspot function. Please retry later
Account not set up for tethering
"Your phone cannot currently connect to %s's server. Please try again later."
Learn more and subscribe to Mobile Hotspot by visiting My Verizon.
To use Mobile Hotspot, you will need to subscribe to the Mobile Hotspot service
Unable to connect to data network; You may not be subscribed to Tethering or Hotspot service; please contact your phone company.
Unable to connect to data network, turning off Tethering or Hotspot. Your plan may not have the Tethering and Hotspot service. Do you want to see subscription options?
You are not subscribed to Tethering and Hotspot service, Do you want to see subscription options?

"Your current rate plan does not include the Smartphone Mobile HotSpot service which enables sharing your phone's data connection with other devices. Do you want to add the Smartphone Mobile HotSpot service to your rate plan? You can also add it online at https://my.t-mobile.com under Manage > Plans and Services."
"If you would like to subscribe to Mobile Hotspot/Mobile Broadband Connect, call: Consumer: (800) 256-4646, Business: (800) 899-4249."
Your order could not be processed
